page.title: 10PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content:
There is not a very good public transport system through this area. The railway line was closed about twenty years ago, and the track is now a grass-covered ride along the West edge of our area. There are some buses, but they are not frequent and people say they are not very reliable. Most people who do not work on local farms work in Cirencester, Swindon or Cheltenham and travel to work by car.Most families have at least one.
{BUSES OPERATED BY MARCHANT'S COACHES. The bus times through Barnsley. Tuesday 07.55 and 10.04. Wednesday 10.00. Friday 10.18 and 13.22 Saturday 13.45 . NTHS 13.25. Going from Aldsworth (village turn) to Cirencester / Bus station. Then from Cirencester back to Aldsworth.
